pageProps.content:
Shower-MDX

Shower presentation generator with support of MDX syntax, powered by Next.js

Shower-MDX template

Shower Presentation Template is built by Vadim Makeev.

What is it?

This is a project template which lets you create your beautiful Shower presentations with markdown syntax and custom React components.

The following slides demonstrate rendered HTML. Check index.mdx to see how it looks in markdown.

Project repository

Feedback and contributions are warmly welcomed!

Slide Header

Echo Park 8-bit sustainable umami deep v Kickstarter. DIY cliche typewriter brunch, Odd Future sriracha pickled aesthetic. Farm-to-table bespoke fingerstache, kale chips umami brunch letterpress.

Whatever authentic disrupt, you probably haven’t heard of them direct trade mlkshk Etsy. Gluten-free roof party plaid four loko quinoa.

Echo Park 8-bit sustainable umami deep v Kickstarter.

Plain code block (markdown syntax)

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head> <!--Comment-->
    <title>Shower</title>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="screen.css">
</head>

Highlighted code (jsx component)

<!DOCTYPE html>  <html lang="en">   <head> <!--Comment-->   <title>Shower</title>   <meta charset="UTF-8">   <link rel="stylesheet" href="screen.css"><title>Shower</title>
